CustomField.inlineHelpText: Walking in the shelter with unfamiliar person. Allow them to explore, sniff and toilet, observe behaviour towards any noise.
CustomField.label: On Leash - Behaviour

value.fullName: Relaxed/engaged: walks loose leash, checks in, explores, body language soft/loose
value.label: Relaxed/engaged: walks loose leash, checks in, explores, body language soft/loose

value.fullName: Excitable/distracted: alert, higher arousal, recovers, may pull lightly, jump/dart
value.label: Excitable/distracted: alert, higher arousal, recovers, may pull lightly, jump/dart

value.fullName: Anxious/fearful: high vigilance, low posture, erratic, may jump up, dart, freeze
value.label: Anxious/fearful: high vigilance, low posture, erratic, may jump up, dart, freeze

value.fullName: Overstimulated: high arousal/intensity, may bite lead/mouth, body barge, two person, difficult to control
value.label: Overstimulated: high arousal/intensity, may bite lead/mouth, body barge, two person, difficult to control

value.fullName: Frustrated/conflicted: motivation decrease distance, may be vocal (whines, high pitched barking),
value.label: Frustrated/conflicted: motivation decrease distance, may be vocal (whines, high pitched barking)

value.fullName: Repulsion/high intensity: motivation increase distance, may growl, lunge, bark, growl-bark or redirect
value.label: Repulsion/high intensity: motivation increase distance, may growl, lunge, bark, growl-bark or redirect
